predicate.note: Frames file for 'exorcise' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 10.5.

example.name: just transitive
example.text: The Rev. Alphonsus Trabold, a theology professor and exorcism expert at St. Bonaventure University in Olean, N.Y., frequently is asked *trace* *trace* to exorcise unruly spirits, and he often obliges.
example.arg: *trace* -> *trace* -> The Rev. Alphonsus Trabold, a theology professor and exorcism expert at St. Bonaventure University in Olean, N.Y.,

example.name: passive with source
example.text: John's room was exorcised of smelly socks.
